name: 曹筱玥
objective:
互動科技與遍佈運算技術促使建築空間成為整合媒體資訊中介界面。課程目標在利用數位資訊科技以設計使用者為中心、服務導向，敏感、回應與協調的居住環境，促使學習者多重思考未來居住空間之規劃設計可能性，與掌握相關技術。教學除專業課程，與產、官、學研究性、實務利用性的專業講題、個案研討，並輔以報告作品小組討論為評量方式。

Interaction technology and ubiquitous computing reform architectural space to an integrated media-information interface. The course objectives are to promote students to think planning of the future living space, and designing of a user-centered, service-oriented, sensitive, reflective, coordinated environment by digital interaction technology. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, professional seminar and case study, and evaluated by students' reports, group discussion and presentation.
